data.description: Software Engineering InternThe Software Engineer Intern will support our Retail Tech team to help modernize our technology ecosystem by identifying, documenting, and retiring obsolete code and infrastructure artifacts.What You’ll Do (Primary Responsibilities)·  Identify and archive legacy code repositories·  Archive build pipeline projects·  Collaborate with software engineers, analysts and quality analysts· Conduct research on archival best practices· Effective documentation of processes Qualifications:• Currently enrolled as a junior is a Bachelor's degree program in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field• Basic knowledge of development or scripting languages such as C#, Java, JavaScript, PowerShell preferred Desired Skills:Effectively communicate blockers and concerns to the team and proactively solicit guidance for more complexproblems.• Self-motivated and eager to learn; rapidly improve and apply what you have learned. Why Clayton:Holidays (Memorial Day and Independence Day)On-site restaurant and work out facilityAt Clayton, we encourage holistic wellness with physical, nutritional, social, financial, spiritual and occupational programs Why Clayton?Clayton is a leading single-family, values-driven home builder dedicated to attainable housing, sustainable practices and creating a world-class experience for customers and team members. Quarterly profit share bonus program. Onsite gym with variety of classes, wellness, professional and personal development programs and much more! Clayton is committed to creating an inclusive workplace. Clayton is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.Business Unit - B00023Technology
